original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 328.30/40 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 328.20/40 to the US dollar on Tuesday, from 328.10/30 the previous day, dealers said.
On the Colombo Stock Exchange, the All Share Price Index opened up 0.05 percent at 10,749.
The S&P SL20 was up 0.04 percent at 3,068. Turnover was 77 million.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 14.00/10 percent from 13.90/14.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 14.30/40 percent from 14.00/14.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.30/40 percent from 14.20/35 percent. (Colombo/Dec5/2023)
